title: Understanding Research Methodologies
text: Research methodologies are systematic plans for conducting research. They include qualitative and quantitative methods, each with distinct characteristics and purposes.

hintAnswer: Qualitative research focuses on understanding concepts and experiences, while quantitative research focuses on numerical data and statistical analysis.
title: Qualitative vs. Quantitative
text: What is the primary difference between qualitative and quantitative research methods?
choices: Qualitative research focuses on numerical data, while quantitative research focuses on understanding concepts and experiences
Qualitative research is subjective and explores phenomena, while quantitative research is objective and measures variables
There is no difference; both methods use statistical analysis
Qualitative research is more reliable than quantitative research
